title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka
description: Donate winter clothing to low-income families and street dwellers in Dhaka.

title: Blankets for Rural Dhaka
description: Provide warm blankets to rural families in the outskirts of Dhaka.

title: Winter Essentials for Chittagong
description: Support fishermen and low-income families in Chittagong with winter essentials.

title: Clothing Drive for Hill Tracts
description: Warm clothing for indigenous communities in the Chittagong Hill Tracts.

title: Warmth for Sylhet Families
description: Help Sylhet families with warm clothes and support for cold nights.

title: Cozy Winter for Tea Garden Workers
description: Provide warm clothing to workers in the Sylhet tea gardens facing harsh winters.

title: Blankets for Khulna's Vulnerable
description: Distribute warm blankets to low-income families in Khulna city.

title: Winter Clothing for Sundarbans
description: Donate winter clothing to communities living near the Sundarbans.
